net.jordaria.math

Class Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.math.Random

  • public class Random
extends java.lang.Object
    A Mersenne twister algorithm.

      • getIntBetween

        public int getIntBetween(int min,
                int max)
        Returns a random int between the given values, inclusive.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum number
        max - The maximum number
        Returns:
        The generated int

      • nextBoolean

        public boolean nextBoolean(float probablilty)
        Generates a boolean with a given probability of being true. The probability is a float from 0.0f to 1.0f, with 0 being no chance of returning true and 1 being a 100% chance of returning true.
        Parameters:
        probablilty - The chance of returning true
        Returns:
        The generated boolean
